text:
@piersmorgan As opposed to an unelected senior advisor to Boris Johnson who deliberately flauted the lockdown restrictions and may have caused the spread of COVID-19 on his 260 mile trip(s) to Durham and his outing to Barnard Castle! D
He clearly didn't care if he endangered others!
